Articles.Content:
*Insert Generic Post about how I'm a Newbie here*

In all seriousness though, I found out this site was here, and considering how in to KSP I've gotten recently, I figured I may as well join, rather than lurking and whatnot. So... here I am now to post about who-knows-what regarding KSP!

Welcome to the forums. These forums are definitely not generic.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the forums, humanoid carbon-based lifeform who operates under the handle of: Destroyer713. Your post has been analyzed, evaluated, and cataloged for our records. Please enjoy your simulated interactive experience provided by our system, Destroyer713, just like I, a fellow humanoid carbon-based lifeform (who is totally not a robot) have for the past: 1 Years, 9 Months, 13 Days, 11 Hours, and 26 Seconds.

...But seriously, welcome to the forums! Hope you enjoy your stay. Feel free to jump right in and share your experiences, ask or answer questions, or even share any fan works you may have.
